post_title: FS: T206 Lajoie Throwing Old Mill SGC 2.5 (Low Pop) - SOLD
post_content:
FS: T206 Nap Lajoie Throwing - Old Mill SGC 2.5 - SOLD (or best offer)

I'm collecting the set without regard to back, so this card doesn't fit my collection as much as I assume it might for others.  Based on the pop report, I think this is a fairly tough combo for Old Mill collectors.  

In addition to cash offers, I'd also potentially be interested in a trade for the same card in Piedmont/Sweet Cap back in similar grade (2-3, PSA or SGC), plus a reasonable cash kicker that could be negotiated.  

Any questions, please feel free to reach out.
